moves.1. d4 d5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. c3 Bf5 4. e3 a6 5: Weakens the kingside, but defences the e4 move from white, what I wanted all the time. I must now search for other plans.
moves.9. a3 Qf6 10. c4: If it doesnot go on the kingside, I must try to broke blacks' Queenside.
moves.10... dxc4 11. Nxc4 O-O-O: He just castles into my attack. I wa happy about it.
moves.12. Nxd6+ Rxd6 13. Qc3 Nge7 14. b4 Nd5 1: I try to open files for my rooks. After Nxe5 dxe5 I would have a big advantage.
moves.17... f4 18. e4: I donot let him to attack my king.
moves.18... Nde7 19. Nxc6: Even he takes my Knight with rook or Knight, the d5 push seems deadly out.
moves.21. a4 c6 22. d5 e5 23. b5 cxd5 24. exd5: The black king is alone and the Bxe5 gives pain.
